Description: Welcome to this beautiful 2-bedroom unit nestled just steps away from the sparkling beach, offering you a captivating coastal lifestyle. As you step inside, you'll be instantly drawn to the abundance of natural lighting that floods the space and the striking allure of gorgeous hardwood floors, adding an element of sophistication and charm to the interior. Convenience is at its finest with laundry facilities available in the building, making household chores a breeze. No need to venture far for your laundry needs.
